law.catch_line: Execution of documents delivered to Secretary of State for filing.

text.section: This section relates exclusively to execution of documents delivered for filing to the Secretary of State, and shall not control as to the execution of other documents of an entity or foreign entity.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 127, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 9, effective January 1, 2011.
